title: More MoxieTV goodness
body: UPDATED I'm not going to lie to you, I haven't even started on my 5 piece article regarding the rise and fall of the cinema industry. There's several reasons for this: 1) we're right in the middle of moving, 2) we've been fairly busy at the theater, 3) Justin is running me ragged with MoxieTV shoots, and 4) I can't think of a good title for the articles. Don't you worry your sweet little head though - I'll write them... eventually. As for MoxieTV, episode 2 will be available either late tonight or early tomorrow. We just wrapped primary shooting this morning and it looks like it's going to be an interesting one, to say the very least. If you haven't checked out the MoxieTV page lately, you might notice a few changes... go see for yourself - http://www.moxiecinema.com/moxietv. We'd like to include some audience reaction shots for THE MATADOR in episode 3, so I'm thinking we'll film those after the 7:00 show on Saturday. If you'd like to be included, feel free to show up for that showing and have your face seen by tens of twenties of people. Trust me, it'll be a good time. Ok, I have a buttload of things to finish before we open doors in a couple hours. Hopefully we'll see everyone here for DARWIN'S NIGHTMARE! UPDATE: MoxieTV Episode TWO is now available. Go check it out if you haven't already. ALSO: Don't forget about DARWIN'S NIGHTMARE! Two night's only. We had to beg and plead to get this film... in fact, our print is ONE of only SIX in existence. Don't make us mean and spiteful - come see this movie... it was nominated for an Oscar, for pete's sake!
author: Dan

comments.author: Ben Dillon
comments.body:
I smell an Emmy nomination.

And it's quite an odd smell.

Nice choice of music, by the way.

comments.author: Nate
comments.body:
Nobody has ever made quite clear to me the distinction between buttload and assload.

They are both heavy loads, obviously, of abstract concepts (such as stress) or physical objects (such as Fitz's Diet Rootbeer, as in: once again, we are overstocked and have an assload of Fitz's Diet Rootbeer).  However, I feel some cultural consensus should be reached over which is greater than the other.  I go with assload.

Then, of course, there is crapload, which is merely made up and not a real word.

comments.author: Jonna
comments.body: I'd say that a buttload is more, simply because there are more letters.  Also, if each letter were assigned a numerical value, where A = 1, B = 2, et cetera, then a buttload is definitely more than an assload.

comments.author: Nate
comments.body:
But(t) you could just as(s) easily make the argument that assload is more, since A begins the alphabet, and thus has primacy over B.

See:

Academic grades.

Alpha males vs. Beta males

"A list" stars

B movies

The A-Team

comments.author: Ben Dillon
comments.body: I'd say a buttload and assload are relative to the person.
